tasks.mutation: mutation createRules($var: [IIoRestorecommerceRuleRule!]!){ access_control { rule { Create( input: { items: $var, totalCount: 0 } ) { status { key code message } } } }}
mutation createPolicies($var: [IIoRestorecommercePolicyPolicy!]!){ access_control { policy { Create( input: { items: $var, totalCount: 0 } ) { status { key code message } } } }}
mutation createPolicySets($var: [IIoRestorecommercePolicySetPolicySet!]!){ access_control { policy_set { Create( input: { items: $var, totalCount: 0 } ) { status { key code message } } } }}
mutation createUsers($var: [IIoRestorecommerceUserUser!]!){ identity { user { Create( input: { items: $var, totalCount: 0 } ) { status { key code message } } } }}
